analyzed: autpal dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i skra can ma'o ;
translated: autpal dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i skra can ma'o

original: / mchog sbyin dang padma'i phyag ni zla 'od do //
analyzed: / mchog sbyin dang padma'i phyag ni zla 'od do //
translated: The mudra of supreme generosity and lotus is Candraprabha.

original: padma dmar po bsnams shing mchog sbyin gyi phyag ni skra can ma'o //
analyzed: padma dmar po bsnams shing mchog sbyin gyi phyag ni skra can ma'o //
translated: The mudra of holding a red lotus and supreme generosity is Rodrakesi.

original: lte ba'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'khor bzhin pa me'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'khor bzhin pa me'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Above the navel is an eight-spoked wheel spinning, similar to the light of fire.

original: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: Above that is a moon mandala.

original: de'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa'o //
translated: Above that is a four-spoked wheel.

original: 'khor lo'i bar du yi ge gzhan rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i bar du yi ge gzhan rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Between the wheels, one should meditate on the other syllables.

original: de bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge rnams lha rnams kyi gzugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge rnams lha rnams kyi gzugs so //
translated: In the same way, the syllables of the mantra are the forms of the deities.

original: de rnams kyi thugs kar yi ge gzhan rnams de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs kar yi ge gzhan rnams de bzhin du'o //
translated: In their hearts, the other syllables are the same.

original: de nas yi ge mtha' dag yon tan kun gyi ro dang ldan pas phyogs bcu ji snyed pa rnams khyab par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yi ge mtha' dag yon tan kun gyi ro dang ldan pas phyogs bcu ji snyed pa rnams khyab par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should see all the syllables pervading as far as the ten directions, endowed with the taste of all qualities.

original: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The instruction on meditating on the venerable noble Manjushri is complete.
